title: 33. To Catch a Fugitive
description: Who is likelier to get to the fugitive first? When a fugitive is on the run, it’s not only the police he has to worry about. A bounty hunter could be coming after him, too.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Who is likelier to get to the fugitive first? When a fugitive is on the run, it’s not only the police he has to worry about. A bounty hunter could be coming after him, too.
